import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { MeetingscheduleService } from '../services/meetingschedule.service'; import { Meetingschedule } from '../classes/meetingschedule'; import { MeetingrequestService } from '../services/meetingrequest.service'; import { Meetingrequest } from '../classes/meetingrequest'; @Component({ selector: 'app-admin-meetings', templateUrl: './admin-meetings.component.html', styleUrls: ['./admin-meetings.component.css'] }) export class AdminMeetingsComponent { newRef = new FormGroup({ name:new FormControl(), email:new FormControl(), participants:new FormControl(), date:new FormControl(), topic:new FormControl() }); }
